resources.string: At ACME Butchers we offer you the best meats, sausages and prepared dishes, among other gourmet delicacies. If you have an event and want to delight your guests with healthy, fresh and tasty products, contact us.
Place your order today and have it ready at your home tomorrow
We do not have prepared trays. Our court is both a craftsman and a professional.
Quality meat from the Pyrenean valleys. With the best guarantees of health and taste.
In our refrigerated transport we guarantee that we will comply within 24 hours with our commitments.
We serve the best restaurants in Zaragoza. If you run a restaurant, call us.
The best examples of Iberian ham and traditional sausages. Specialists in delicatessen .
